replies.body: I don't think you're going to make it.

Well I think the matchmaking is kind of cute, since it's trying hard to help you fulfill the goal you set for yourself when you named the account.

But really though, your team has 4 slots for idiots while the enemy has 5, assuming you aren't one yourself. Hence I wouldn't say the matchmaking is simply being hard on you as statistically, if you are above the average of the elo bracket and you don't make too much silly mistakes, you really should win more.

Win or lose streak, it should more or less, even out. If you're good for your elo you'll natually climb and same for vice versa.

Another thing is, the solo queue has some grinding incorporated into the system unless your skill is way beyond your current elo otherwise a swift climb isn't all that possible as there are other random factors, like teammates being one.

So if you wish to simply avoid the chances of getting bad teams occasionally, then play 5s.
